verbs.description: [ARG1: Three Americans] [V: detained] [ARGM-TMP: for more than a year] [ARGM-LOC: in North Korea] were welcomed back to the United States by President Donald Trump , first lady Melania Trump and other members of the administration at Joint Base Andrews in Maryland early Thursday .

Three Americans detained for more than a year in North Korea [V: were] welcomed back to the United States by President Donald Trump , first lady Melania Trump and other members of the administration at Joint Base Andrews in Maryland early Thursday .

[ARG1: Three Americans detained for more than a year in North Korea] were [V: welcomed] [ARG2: back to the United States] [ARG0: by President Donald Trump , first lady Melania Trump and other members of the administration] [ARGM-LOC: at Joint Base Andrews in Maryland] [ARGM-TMP: early Thursday] .
